entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a character who is watching Snape and Sirius leave. He is described as having a trace of apprehension on his face.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is introduced as a character who is leaving with Sirius. He is described as sweeping wordlessly.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is introduced as a character who is leaving with Snape.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the person to whom Dumbledore is speaking. He is instructed to take the rest of his potion.

entities.name: diggorys
entities.description: The Diggorys are mentioned as people that Dumbledore needs to see downstairs.
